name: GameJam JAM
description:
The Theme of the Jam was "Joined together"

So for my second ever Jam, I tried to fit into that by using multiple viewpoints:

You join music notes together to create a song.

You join together with other people to refine and polish it.

Music is one of the few things that can join us together over boundarys like countrys, languages, religions and politics.
Very few Things allow us to do that.
And in current times, we need all we can get to keep us from being divided.

In my game, up to 7 people can work on a song one after the other to create something interesting.
I wanted people to be able to upload and download from a server but couldn`t get it running in time, so here´s the alternative ive come up with:
Please feel free to post your tunes here and to work on the ones others have posted. You just need to get to the same menu and click "Copy to clipboard". To load a tune, simply create a .txt file in the same folder as the others and then load it from within the game.

It doesnt have to be perfect, so lets join and create some interesting music here :D

Here´s a little piece you might recognise:

Here´s where the date will be saved if you have trouble finding it:

Windows: %APPDATA%\Godot\
MacOS~/Library/Application Support/Godot/
Linux: ~/.local/share/godot/
